title: TCS chairman N Chandrasekaran says GenAI to create impact not seen or imagined
description: In FY24 from April 2023 to March 2024, TCS also consolidated AI and Cloud expertise with the creation of the AI.Cloud unit.
content: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Indiaâ€™s largest IT services company, chairman N Chandrasekaran has said that generative artificial intelligence or GenAI technologies will impact almost every sector and country going forward, according to the annual report 2024 released on Thursday.
